data.prayer: Father, encourage the 14,309 believers in Wardha to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Wardha, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Wardha.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,300,800 people living in Wardha, Maharashtra, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Wardha, Maharashtra, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bahrupi people.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Wardha.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Wardha, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,270,708 lost people in  Wardha, Maharashtra, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

location.name: Wardha
location.people_groups_list: Kunbi Hindre, Beldar Sunkar, Kolowar, Banjara Rathod (Hindu traditions), Gond Sonjhari
